title: Bhavana to start the shoot of her new movie Adam with Prithviraj and Narain very soon - Tamil Movie News - IndiaGlitz.com
text: Bhavana clarifies on Mallika The hit pair Prithviraj and Bhavana will be teaming up yet again for the Malayalam movie 'Adam', directed by Jinu Abraham. Popular Malayalam and Tamil actor Narain is also playing an important role in this film. The latest update is that the movie's first schedule will start rolling soon with Prithviraj and Bhavana The actress who has suffered a sexual assault on a moving car recently, was initially hesitant to join the first schedule. But after being encouraged by her co-stars, Bhavana has now given her nod to join the shoot. That's really good news for everyone who was shocked by the outrageous attack on a popular actress. We salute the courage of Bhavana and we wish she reaches much bigger heights in her film career.
